C

Category - Class in org.taskmanager.taskmanager.model
This is a Class representing a Category of the application.
Category(int, String) - Constructor for class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.model.Category
Constructor used by the CategoryJsonUtils to recreate categories upon loading the application, created in the previous runs of the application.
Category(String) - Constructor for class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.model.Category
Constructor for new Category that the User can add to the application.
CategoryController - Class in org.taskmanager.taskmanager.controller
This is a class that controls the category Management window of the application.
CategoryController() - Constructor for class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.controller.CategoryController
The constructor of the CategoryController which is never used or called.
CategoryJsonUtils - Class in org.taskmanager.taskmanager.utils
This class is used for the communication between the Category Repository and the JSON document.
CategoryJsonUtils() - Constructor for class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.utils.CategoryJsonUtils
The constructor of the CategoryJsonUtils which is never used or called.
CategoryRepository - Class in org.taskmanager.taskmanager.repository
This class is a repository of all the categories as well as the category maps (from name to id and reverse).
CategoryRepository() - Constructor for class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.repository.CategoryRepository
Constructor of the Category Repository, only called in MediaLabController and then passed on in the apps it is needed to avoid having duplicate repositories.
ChangeTaskPriority(int) - Method in class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.repository.TaskRepository
This method is utilised when a priority is deleted.
checkIfDelayed() - Method in class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.model.Task
This method is used when we first open the application and check whether one of the old tasks is delayed and changes its state.
COMPLETED - Enum constant in enum class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.utils.TaskStateUtils
Represents a completed task.
